content: Yanghao Xie was born in Chongqing, China in 1991. He received B.E. in information engineering and B.A. in editing and publishing science degrees from South China University of Technology, Guangzhou, China in 2014. He is currently pursuing the Ph.D. degree in Communication and Information System at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, Chengdu, China. His research interests include network modeling and optimization, algorithm design, Network Function Virtualization, and Network Slicing.
summary: Yanghao Xie was born in Chongqing, China in 1991. He received B.E. in information engineering and B.A. in editing and publishing science degrees from South China University of Technology, Guangzhou, China in 2014.
title: Yanghao Xie
